title: Emergency Room Wait Times
body: A hospital is trying to cut down on emergency room wait times. It is interested in the amount of time patients must wait before being called back to be examined. An investigation committee randomly surveyed $$70$$ patients. The sample mean was $$1.5$$ hours with a sample standard deviation of $$0.5$$ hours.
lesson: 7.3 Estimating a Population Mean (using the Student t Distribution)
